Description: Markhor creates designer-quality, handcrafted footwear at a revolutionary price point.
Full Description: Markhor makes and delivers handcrafted shoes in 5 days at half the price of designer brands. They contract directly with the same craftsmen who make shoes for some of the top European brands, pay them up to 5X more, cut out the middlemen, and pass on 50% in savings to the final customer. Every year over $15 billion worth of luxury shoes are purchased worldwide. However, the shoemakers often live on less than $5/day. When you buy a pair of luxury shoes today, more than half of the money you spend goes to middlemen who do not design or make the shoes, nor supply the raw materials of the shoes. Thankfully, the era of luxury apparel companies attracting high-end customers while at the same time exploiting workers in developing countries is coming to an end. Today, more and more customers of luxury goods want to connect with the craftsmen who make their products, and care about their welfare. So far, they've raised money from two of their earliest customers Vijay Rao and Nadeem Sheikh.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Clothing and Apparel, Commerce and Shopping, Design

Description: Magic QR Promotions. Built for ads and influencer campaigns.
Full Description: Flyshot is a patent-pending coupon technology and influencer platform that adds convenience to customers' redemption experience while boosting conversion rates. Flyshot's Magic QR Coupons replace traditional alphanumeric coupon codes when added to ads or influencer content. Instead of expecting customers to remember and type in coupon codes or redeem them immediately upon seeing a link, Flyshot's Magic QR Coupons lets them take screenshots of ads and upload them at checkout at their convenience. The same applies to influencer campaigns that predominantly use coupon codes for conversion attribution.  Uploading screenshots allows customers to redeem coupons when they're ready and improves brand recall. The redemption process is cut by three steps and generates more approx—11% more impressions for the same CPMs.  Of 1018 Instagram users, 74.8% prefer to redeem coupons by uploading screenshots instead of typing in alphanumeric codes. Flyshot's platform also supports full-suite influencer campaign management include a database of 3.2 million influencers, automated invites, chat, content approvals, conversion analytics, and more. The conversion KPIs include attributed revenue, conversion rates, and returns. Magic QR Coupons are also compatible with ads on any channel. For more information, please visit www.flyshot.io.
Industry Groups: Advertising, Commerce and Shopping, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: Hypervisor-based connected car solutions that simplify in-car hardware and software infrastructure, streamline implementation and management
Full Description: Perseus's hypervisor technology and security solution simplifies and secures automobile infrastructure. A standard ARM SoC found in the automotive industry can only support one operating system, and connected cars typically carry 120 SoCs, but we can reduce that to 30 with our solution, saving up to 75% on average, and of course with a simpler ecosystem, it’s easier to secure.  With Perseus hypervisor, we are able to run multiple applications or operating systems off of a single SoC, which helps to reduce the in-car system complexity.  Our technology is able to offer a fine grained on/off rate control and flexible and real-time control security parameters. Our security parameters can be pre-programmed, controlled algorithmically, or just manually recorded to requirement. Also, we’re able to offer a 100% performance guarantee of systems that we secure even under an OS attack.
Industry Groups: Privacy and Security, Software, Transportation
Top 5 Investors: TIPS Program, Kakao Ventures, POSCO CAPITAL, The Wells Investment

Full Description: TSG Therapeutics is a preclinical-stage biopharmaceutical company on a mission to eliminate viral infectious disease. TSG has designed a novel class of broad-spectrum antiviral drugs that are adaptable, scalable, and therapeutically effective against a wide range of emerging and re-emerging viruses.  By utilizing disruptive approaches across engineering and medicine, we have developed a proven platform for developing drug candidates with potent antiviral activity against diverse classes of viruses. Whereas conventional approaches are based on a narrow “one bug, one drug” concept, our strategy is driven by a “one drug, many bugs” vision that will lead to clinical solutions for a wide range of viral infections and improve billions of lives around the world. TSG Therapeutics was established on April 1, 2016 by Will W. Park in Singapore, Central Region.

Description: Amniotics is a biopharma company focusing on mesenchymal stem cells (MSC) from amniotic fluid.
Full Description: Amniotics is a biopharma company focusing on mesenchymal stem cells (MSC) from amniotic fluid. The company was born out of the discovery of a novel source of stem cells in full-term amniotic fluid. Based on a decade of research at the internationally recognized Lund University Stem Cell Centre and the University Hospital of Lund, the company is pioneering the harvesting and propagation of tissue specific neonatal quality mesenchymal stem cells (MSC). These stem cells have unique properties for applications in regenerative medicine. Amniotics has also an, by Läkemedelsverket (MPA in Sweden), approved GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) manufacturing facility to produce Advanced therapy medicinal products (ATMPs). With the GMP facilities operational since 2020, Amniotics is now moving into clinical trials with the leading drug candidate, PulmoStem™ and is looking to establish strategic partnerships with researchers and companies that are interested in developing stem-cell-based therapies targeting diseases with high unmet needs.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Science and Engineering

Description: Biodol Therapeutics made a breakthrough discovery on the origin and maintenance of NP.
Full Description: Biodol Therapeutics, founded in 2015, develops first-in-class compounds for the treatment of chronic pain (CP). Biodol Therapeutics has identified the Receptor Tyrosine Kinase (RTK) FLT3 as a key player for triggering and maintaining the chronic neuropathic pain (NP) state. New findings from Biodol Therapeutics' academic partnership (Cyril Rivat and Jean Valmier at the INSERM Institute for Neurosciences in Montpellier) also demonstrated that FLT3 inhibition increases the potency of opioids for their analgesic effect, and hereby reduces their safety risks, especially addiction risk, which will help fighting the Opioid Crisis. The development of extracellular inhibitors of the FLT3 receptor, is a proprietary and key approach developed by Biodol Therapeutics.

Description: A one-stop-shop bike marketplace
Full Description: Bicycles are healthy, fun, and the most energy-efficient mode of transportation. But getting, owning, or even selling a bike is still annoyingly difficult.  BikeFair is a data-driven one-stop-shop bike marketplace: a simple pay & ride platform for users and a seamless plug-and-play solution integrating to existing systems for businesses. The idea of BikeFair arose from our personal need to buy an affordable bike for everyday use in the Netherlands. That felt like an extremely hard & annoying thing to do with the outdated classifieds platforms, social media groups, and bike shops distributed across the entire city. We were also fed up with the number of bicycles we and our friends have already lost to theft, and with the hassle everyone has to go through when something unexpected happens to their bike. We realized there is a way out of this: by a smart use of data, we can facilitate the long-postponed industry shift to online.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping

Description: Betobit.net offers secure, easy crypto trading.
Full Description: Betobit.net is an Australia-based cryptocurrency exchange designed to simplify the trading of digital assets. As a key player in the burgeoning crypto market, Betobit.net offers a secure, intuitive, and feature-rich platform that has rapidly gained traction among a global user base. We specialize in providing a seamless trading experience that caters to both novices and seasoned crypto enthusiasts. Security is our bedrock. In a digital landscape often fraught with risks, we've employed top-tier cybersecurity protocols to ensure the safety of our users' funds. Multi-layer encryption, cold storage solutions, and two-factor authentication are just a few of the protective measures we have in place. The user experience on Betobit.net is designed to be intuitive. Our interface is clean, straightforward, and easy to navigate—a stark contrast to the clutter and complexity commonly associated with crypto trading platforms. Even if you're new to cryptocurrency, our simple design ensures that you can easily find your way around. Diversity is another hallmark of our service offering. We provide access to a broad array of cryptocurrencies, from popular ones like Bitcoin and Ethereum to lesser-known altcoins. This comprehensive selection allows users to diversify their portfolios without having to switch between multiple platforms. We understand that the crypto market never sleeps, and neither should your ability to trade. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. Whether you have a question or encounter an issue, our dedicated support team is always just a click away. Furthermore, our customer service isn't just reactive; we actively monitor for issues to resolve them before they become problems for our users. Automated trading is another feature that sets us apart. Our robust API allows for seamless integration with custom trading strategies and third-party applications. This is particularly beneficial for traders who wish to execute complex orders or manage multiple accounts. To enhance your trading experience, Betobit.net also provides special promotional codes that offer discounts and exclusive access to premium features. These promos add an extra layer of value, making your trading activities on our platform not just profitable but also cost-effective. Our learning center is a treasure trove of information. Whether you're a newcomer looking to understand the basics or a seasoned trader keen on honing your skills, our educational content is designed to suit a range of needs. Tutorials, market analyses, and FAQs are regularly updated to keep you informed and empowered. Lastly, but certainly not least, we value transparency. Our fee structure is straightforward, with no hidden costs. We believe that the cornerstone of any successful business is the trust it builds with its customers, and we are committed to earning that trust every day. Headquartered in Melbourne, Victoria, at the prestigious Rialto Tower, Betobit.net is perfectly positioned at the nexus of technology and finance. Our aim is to be at the forefront of the cryptocurrency revolution, offering our users unparalleled access to the digital future. Choose Betobit.net for a trading experience that is secure, user-friendly, and endlessly rewarding.

Description: Smart health system
Full Description: Unfortunately, in Mexico only 5% of the population has access to a private health insurance. Everyone else, can have access to IMSS or ISSSTE. At present doesn’t exist a prevention culture, if you don’t have healthy habits or if your genes simply are not on your favor, probably you could develop a complicated illness or health condition and next pay for medical attention in the private sector.  We are developing an integral system of digital health, that allows to: -	Access to a healthcare provider’s network that offer economical services for a timely attention. -	A lifetime of medical data integrated and the possibility of sharing the information with the patient’s healthcare providers. -	Predictive analysis to generate personalized follow-ups. -	To help create a prevention culture we offer free services as: o Medical advice in person and through telemedicine. o Initial check-up and blood tests. All those services are included in a Basic annual membership for $199.00 pesos. The health data digitalization has the potential to improve access to healthcare, reduce expenses, and to reach people who wouldn’t have access to services. Today we are playing a part in the creation of new health care models,  Do you join us?

Industries: Developer Platform, Health Care, Psychology, Video Games, Wellness
Description: Behavioral therapeutics for pediatric patients delivered through a mobile game
Full Description: We offer a personalised approach to improve patient outcomes and empower ill children to live healthier lives by delivering digital therapeutics through a mobile game. Our aim is to become the global leader in digital therapeutics for pediatric patients. Triumf was named as the TOP digital health company in Europe in 2019 and in TOP20 across all industries in Europe. The company combines game environment and validated psychological theories for children to monitor and support their well-being in a personalized manner by using machine learning. The data from the game is analyzed and gathered to a dashboard for the care team to improve treatment monitoring, medical visit effectiveness and patient-doctor communication. Digital health interventions such as the Triumf game have great potential to act as health improving scalable tools by contributing to the effectiveness, accessibility and personalisation of healthcare delivery. However, digital solutions need to be evaluated using scientific methodology to prove their effectiveness and safety. We completed a multi-site clinical study in 2018 among pediatric cancer patients and showed that Triumf digital health intervention has a positive effect on players emotional state and health related quality of life. We showed that the total acceptability percentage of the game was 86%. Importantly, 100% answered that the game was easy to use and the content and information was useful and trustworthy. Furthermore, 100% would recommend the game to a friend. By comparing pre-study and post-study mean scores of mental wellbeing and quality of life, we found improvements in mental health and health related quality of life. We have proven that play is the way to healthier life. The research is now published in the digital journal JMIR. Randomised control trials amongst pediatric diabetes patients and children undergoing surgery are currently ongoing in Singapore, Estonia and Finland. Triumf mobile health game is available for Android operating system and it features paths for kids with 1. cancer; 2. diabetes; 3. asthma 4.weight problems 5.surgery. It is available in English, Russian, Finnish and Estonian languages (Spanish in pipeline).
Industry Groups: Gaming, Health Care, Software

Description: River BioMedics is a biotech company that aims to develop human 3D in vitro 3D human heart tissue for pre-clinical drug testing.
Full Description: River BioMedics is a biotech company that aims to develop human 3D in vitro 3D human heart tissue for pre-clinical drug testing. Currently pharmaceutical companies spend a billion dollar figure on the development of a new drug entity, with a 90% chance of it failing to reach the market. The most common reason for failure during this developmental stage is drug induced cardiac toxicity. To solve this issue we develop 3D cardiac tissues, resembling the working human heart, for advanced drug discovery and toxicity screening using a multidisciplinary human stem cell-based approach.

Description: Business specialized in the sale of limited edition sneakers and streetwear
Full Description: Launched in 2018, dropout is an Italy-based business specialised in the sale of authentic limited edition sneakers and streetwear. With a highly trafficked flagship store located in the centre of Milan, dropout proved a huge success right from the start: over 1000 people attended to the store on its opening weekend, and its doors have seen over 50000 visitors from all over the world.  The e-commerce dropoutmilano.com has seen millions of visitors and thousands of sales, guaranteeing authenticity of all products shipped and providing free delivery across EU. To support the business activities, dropout's team have developed a software of technical analysis for the secondary streetwear market, named HypeAnalyzer. In dropout, pricing and marketing are automated and data-driven by HypeAnalyzer algorithms. Output of these also include data for consignment rates (dynamic and affected by things such as volatility and demand, objectively calculated) and discounts. dropout is looking to scale this, simple yet efficient, model, for many other things retail and e-commerce and is currently studying the creation of a portal for investment in sneakers as alternative assets. HypeAnalyzer is covered by commercial patent in Italy (SIAE, D000014993) and dropout® is trademarked at continental level. Initially opened with no external funding, in October 2021 dropout launched its first funding round, raising €750k via equity crowdfunding in a lightning 6 days, following the board approval of an extension of the initial €500k goal (reached in 4 days out of a 62 days campaign). The move will see dropout open a new retail location as well the opening of several temporary locations throughout Italy; improve its e-commerce and the further development of HypeAnalyzer. The campaign saw the participation of 2 Italian VC funds and over 150 retail investors, who join the founding team made of Kola Tytler, Andrea Canziani, Federico Pasquetti and Stefano Zeppieri.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Clothing and Apparel, Commerce and Shopping, Design, Hardware, Software

Description: MicroByre is a biotechnology company that specializes in microbiology, synthetic biology, molecular biology, and machine learning..
Full Description: MicroByre is a platform for bacterial domestication. Their automated characterization pipeline gathers the oft-overlooked data that highlights unleveraged bacteria that meet functional industrial criteria. That is, they rapidly find the bacteria with naturally unfussy eating habits and evolution-honed metabolisms that have the potential to convert unrefined biomasses into commodity chemicals at vastly improved efficiencies compared to extant fermentation processes. They select from these functionally de-risked bacteria those which can be directly genetically modified to improve their cost profiles — even if they have never been engineered before. The data from our unique characterization pipeline informs the minimally precise genetic modifications necessary to increase pliability and yield, eliminate nutritional additives, maximize feedstock utilization, and improve contamination tolerance & phage resistance. MicroByre gives biomass conversion a truly competitive edge against petrochemical synthesis. 				 MicroByre’s platform bridges the gap between the promising and the profitable in synthetic biology and bioengineering. A unique combination of resources and skills makes MicroByre a valuable potential partner for companies of all sizes and industries. They collaborate to define project scope to match a mutually agreeable business model, which could be a fee for service, license agreement, or joint development agreement.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: QWQ enables every shop in the neighborhood to act as a “virtual ATM” using just a smartphone or its POS-system.
Full Description: QWQ creates virtual ATMs. That brings the power of the sharing economy into cash, logistics, and distribution. 85 percent of global consumer payment is still done using cash. But cash management is a huge problem for the entire industry. If you work at a retail bank, you already know how expensive it is to install an ATM and also to operate it. Most major retail banks globally spend hundreds of millions of dollars annually to distribute cash to their consumers. But it's not just a problem for the retail banks. Retailers struggle as well. When they get paid in cash, they need to collect, can't reconcile, and finally bring the cash back to the bank anyway. Every single step costs them time and money. And if you look at the consumers, they often struggle as well to find an ATM, how much do I have to pay to withdraw cash? I recently read an article it talked about Egypt; some consumers travel seven kilometers to access cash and find the nearest ATM. That's insane. That's exactly where we come in, what Uber did to the taxi industry, Airbnb, to the hotel industry. We are doing it for the ATM industry. We're democratizing the cash distribution process so that a significant portion of the value chain can be eliminated. Anybody can download a mobile app and act as a virtual ATM. We have created a location-based matchmaking platform that connects those who want to withdraw cash in real-time with those who want to deposit cash, which typically could be a local shop owner, like a bakery or pizzeria or a bar or restaurant. This way, the shop owner gets rid of cash and earns a commission. It also attracts additional foot traffic to the store. You, as a consumer, can now withdraw cash at the click of a button whenever you are globally, and finally, banks can save up to 50 percent of their operating costs by simply switching over from a physical ATM to a virtual ATM solution that we provide. How does it work? It's simple, just download an app, connect with your bank account, and request how much you want to withdraw. Let's say you want to withdraw one hundred dollars. It does a geolocation-based search around you to find a spot, basically, a retailer with that hundred dollars for you to go and pick it up. You walk in, show a QR Code, scan the barcode, and hand out the cash to you as if you had just transacted at an ATM. QWQ is a location-based matchmaking platform that connects those who want to withdraw cash with those who want to deposit cash – typically a local shop owner. It builds a community around local businesses and helps them generate physical leads. - Smart algorithm and an amazing user experience  QWQ Value Proposition summary:  Local shops will not only have less cash to manage at the end of the day but also earn a commission & attract new customers by offering a new service and having access to an additional marketing channel -Leads and a new revenue stream. Individuals can avoid an extra trip to the ATM and withdraw money at the click of a button – wherever they are: in a restaurant, a cafe, their favorite local shop,.... - User Convenience. banks and E-wallets can reduce ATM operation costs & complement their ATM network – or even enter new markets without investing significant capital. On top of that, they can leverage a new revenue channel and get closer to their customers. - Scale and expansion
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), Middle East
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Lending and Investments

Industries: Blockchain, Financial Services, FinTech, Real Estate
Description: Unlocking Real Estate with Decentralized Ownership
Full Description: Fractional Finance is building the Frabric Network, a decentralized platform for fractional real estate ownership. Buying and investing in real estate is incredibly challenging for seasoned investors, and it's almost impossible for retail investors.  By leveraging blockchain technologies, we can create a unique and revolutionary investment vehicle; called a Thread. Threads indirectly own and manage real estate, governed in the real world by a legal representative but directed on the blockchain by the collective voting power of investors. By incorporating this structure, Threads aren't beholden to the same restrictions and limitations imposed by regulatory bodies, making Fractional Finance free of any legal liability over the creation and governance of these entities. Because of this, we have the power to scale where others simply cannot. Fractional Finance generates revenue on creating these "Threads" via a tokenization process, which will charge between a ****fee which will cover all operational and legal costs, along with small ****reoccurring fees to cover property management, taxes, and property insurance, which can be opt-outed from. We don't charge any individual for either of our fees, but rather the collective pool of investors and property listers involved in a particular Thread. This "distribution of pain" can allow us to charge higher rates without negatively affecting any particular investor or user and make it easier to persuade property sellers to tokenize and sell on the Frabric Network. As the only decentralized fractional real estate platform; we win via economies of scale and global reach; we don't need to onboard each property ourselves, and to scout the best deals - we provide great referral incentives which will drive existing investors/sellers onto our platform via network effects which will enable us to grow infinitely faster than our competitors.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Other, Real Estate
Top 5 Investors: Blockchain Founders Fund, SMU Entrepreneurship Centre

Description: Long Island University was chartered by the New York State Education Department
Full Description: The Brooklyn campus of Long Island University (LIU) in Brooklyn, New York offers opportunities across the board, whether it’s educational, extracurricular or cultural. Over 200 degree programs are offered at LIU’s Brooklyn campus and include an eclectic grouping of disciplines, such as Business, the Performing and Liberal Arts, Education, Pharmacy Technology and other professional healthcare degrees. LIU Brooklyn also has an adult learner program for those either interested in a degree or single continuing education courses. LIU also works in collaboration with medical centers, hospitals and other organizations so that students may undertake internships and receive other professional opportunities. Countless educational and cultural opportunities can also be found on campus. Art galleries, a performing arts facility, several lecture series, film festivals and professional centers, institutes and associations are some of what you can find at LIU Brooklyn. These opportunities also extend beyond the campus, the New York metropolitan area being one of the world’s most abundant centers of cultural, creative and financial opportunities. Whether it’s finding work in the city’s nearby financial, arts or fashion districts or going to a concert at the world-famous Carnegie Hall, it’s all only a quick walk or subway ride away. Financial aid opportunities are also numerous at Brooklyn’s LIU. In addition to awarding loans, grants and scholarships to eligible students, the school participates in various funding initiatives for special populations such as The Bridges Program.  Applications with instructions are available online and may also be submitted by mail.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US

Description: LifeReady is a secure, cloud-based platform to catalogue and share critical information with trusted contacts.
Full Description: LifeReady is a comprehensive life administration platform that allows people, families, and organizations to manage and organize their vital information in an easy and safe manner. The platform is intended to keep individuals and their loved ones safe in the event of an emergency. LifeReady provides a variety of services that allow users to securely store and manage their digital information, such as online subscriptions, social network logins, passwords, and crypto, as well as their everyday information, such as banking information, superannuation details, and trust details. The platform is based on a proprietary encryption technique known as KeyCrypt, which ensures that all information stored on the LifeReady platform is kept secure through client-side encryption.  This means that the moment any information leaves the user's device, it is already encrypted and protected from hacks, breaches, and unauthorized access.
Industry Groups: Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Software

Description: Phaseform develops next-generation adaptive optics systems based on innovative hardware and software
Full Description: Phaseform develops next-generation adaptive optics systems based on innovative hardware and software. At the heart of our approach to AO is a novel optofluidic microsystem technology that we call Deformable Phase Plate (DPP). Its unique features combine the advantages of deformable mirrors and transmissive liquid crystal spatial light modulators in a compact form, thus paving the way for a new class of ultra-compact, high-efficiency, transparent wavefront modulators. Phaseform aims to bring our scalable and easy-to-use solutions to a wide range of imaging and beam shaping applications in Life Science & Microscopy, Vision Science and Ophthalmology, Material Science & Semiconductors, 3D Micro and Nano Printing, AR/VR/MR and amateur astronomy. Our goal is to make AO affordable and practical, and to bring decades long cutting-edge AO research into fruition. Phaseform aspires to become a leading adaptive optics technology company with a clear vision of continuous innovation - in a New Era of Adaptive Optics​.

Description: FanWide is a free website and app that connects sports fans from every team in any city with fan clubs and game watch parties at sports bar.
Full Description: December 2017 - FanWide has received written commitments for funding that exceeds this $2,000,000 Series A round.  they are continuing to accept investments at the current $8,000,000 valuation for a short time. Please visit our investor's portal at http://fanwi.de/InvestFanWide for the most updated information about FanWide. FanWide is a free website (http://www.FanWide.com) and app (iOS and Android) that connects sports fans from every team in any city. FanWide promotes in-person game watch parties and develops local fan communities for every pro, college, and international team at sports bars nationwide. These venues bid against each other to host the event using FanWide's patent-pending event auction system, and the hosts guarantee that the team's games will be featured with sound! Fan clubs and alumni associations can use FanWide's services to expand their network, organize events, communicate with local fans, collect and report attendance data, enter contests, receive donations, and activate food or drink discounts from the event host or team sponsors. Sports teams and leagues can use FanWide's Sports Data Platform to analyze fan engagement, and all of FanWide’s services can be integrated within the team’s own website or app. Incentivized by promotions and discounts, fans from around the country can check in at events and report watch party attendance. This is used to improve accuracy for Out-Of-Home TV ratings, so broadcast and advertising partners will see a measurable increase in viewership among the younger audience that is unsubscribing from cable. FanWide also offers partners new targeted advertising channels through its digital platform and on-site activation at in-person events nationwide which function like an "extended stadium". Since launching in 2016, Seattle-based FanWide has promoted over 350,000 events at 9,000 hosts for 10,000 fan clubs!  Millions of out-of-market fans can use the free FanWide website or app to find the closest viewing party for their favorite team, wherever they are living or traveling.   Long-term FanWide wants to provide the world's leading platform to automatically match hosts with fans of any interest group, including TV shows, gaming, politics, board games, trivia, and more.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Seattle Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Events, Food and Beverage, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Sales and Marketing, Sports, Travel and Tourism

Description: Inductosense is developing wireless, battery-free, sensors that can be permanently fixed.
Full Description: Inductosense is developing wireless, battery-free, sensors that can be permanently fixed to a product or structure for fast, repeatable inspections of cracks, defects or corrosion. The sensors can operate underneath coatings, insulation or repairs and can also be embedded into a material. They are entirely passive and the power and signal are provided remotely by non-contact inductive coupling from a handheld measurement probe . The technology is referred to as the Wireless And Non Destructive (WAND) system.

Description: Data-Driven Property Development
Full Description: Urban Intelligence has developed a suite of products, driven by technology and data science, which can revolutionise property transactions by reducing transaction times and eliminating costs. At the heart of these is SiteScore, a powerful algorithm that analyses the sustainability of over 28.7 million land parcels in England and Wales by reference to the planning environment, geography, transport and educational links and over 100 other data points. SiteScore’s unique algorithm, building on years of research and input from a range of industry professionals, calculates a bespoke score for each site enabling developers and landowners to assess its potential for development. SiteScore will generate a report, similar to a credit rating, scoring the site objectively against various criteria, which will provide data on a site’s sustainability instantly and in one place, replacing multiple manual reports which are time consuming and costly to prepare. This tool will help property developers to quickly evaluate potential sites and focus attention on those with the greatest potential.

Description: Sports analytics company democratizing access to analytics and technology in sports
Full Description: Athlogic has created a first-of-its-kind application that simplifies the data-entry process, allowing anyone from a team's sideline to record accurate statistics, even if they only have a layman's understanding of football. The data that is recorded creates analytic reports in real-time to give high school coaches the insights they are seeking without the need to understand how the analytics are developed. The data in our application impacts how the team performs and is governed by a proprietary data-validation algorithm. There is no barrier to using the Athlogic application, it’s free to start using.   Conversations with college football players showed that recruiting today favors players from high-income, suburban and urban areas. Additional conversations with college coaches demonstrated that college football is reliant on an outdated, inefficient recruiting process. Because there are no sources of verified data on high school football statistics, and the pressure to recruit the best class of recruits, programs waste billions of dollars vetting recruits by traveling to areas that they believe have a historical, high density of talented athletes.

Description: SaaS platform to consolidate & contextualize all your work.
Full Description: Modern knowledge workers have too many communication channels, too many notifications, too many files, copies, and version, etc. stored across different systems and accounts. They want to be able to simplify their workflow and easily manage it all from one place. They want to see everything that is relevant to a given context, rather than have it broken up by application. Comake is a software platform that automatically consolidates and contextualizes digital information currently existing in these fragmented/siloed environments. Think of it as a wrapper around the tools you use that gives you one place to view, search, communicate, share, and collaborate on the content within 3rd-party systems (similar to how iOS Mail App lets you work with messages in your Gmail, Yahoo, and Hotmail accounts). Comake is a great tool for individuals that grows in value as their collaborators join.

Description: Personalized Guide for Entrepreneurs Building a Better Future
Full Description: Entrepreneurship is like going through life left handed. Everything is harder than it should be. Outside the Silicon Valley bubble, this is even more true. You have to piece together all the resources yourself. Even if you have relationships to guide you, the result is one size fits all solutions that may not be best for your business. At the same time, the need for support for startups is growing drastically as people realized they can work remotely and start a business from home. Or they move to start a business outside of the big expensive cities. The result, is a startup support gap. The startup support gap means startups are fighting gravity just to make it. Current solutions aren't equipped to handle the startup support gap. We have accepted that 90% of businesses fail and there's nothing we can do about it. So the startup support gap lives on terrorizing anyone with the courage to take on the status quo. Until now...

Description: DefineMe is has a clear mission: to empower self-worth and confidence through scent, and use sustainable and good for you ingredients.
Full Description: DefineMe is a visionary fragrance company founded by Jennifer McKay Newton with a clear mission: to empower self-worth and confidence through scent. The journey began when Jennifer witnessed her daughter's struggles and recognized similar challenges within herself and others. This inspired her to create a brand that would make a positive difference in people's lives. What sets us apart at DefineMe is our unwavering commitment to conscious beauty practices. We firmly believe in using only natural, organic, and toxic-free ingredients in our fragrances and products, aligning with the values of customers who prioritize sustainability and ethical choices. We want our customers to feel good about the products they use and the impact they have on themselves and the environment. Ethics and compassion are at the core of our brand. We are proud to be cruelty-free and vegan, ensuring that no animals are harmed in the production of our fragrances, home, and bath and body products. Additionally, we take sustainability seriously by incorporating sustainable packaging materials to minimize our environmental footprint. By embracing local manufacturing in California, we not only support our community but also reduce transportation-related carbon emissions. But our dedication doesn't stop there. We are driven by a strong commitment to social impact. Since 2016, we have proudly supported She's The First, a remarkable nonprofit organization dedicated to combating gender inequality by providing assistance to girls in underprivileged areas, enabling them to become the first in their families to graduate from high school. We wholeheartedly believe in the incredible work led by Tammy Tibbets and her team, and as part of our commitment, we pledge a portion of our annual profits to She's The First. At DefineMe, we are more than just a fragrance company. We are a movement that empowers individuals, embraces conscious beauty practices, utilizes sustainable packaging, and makes a positive impact on society. By choosing DefineMe, you not only discover captivating scents but also support a brand that values self-worth, the environment, and the education of young women around the world. Join us on this inspiring journey.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Community and Lifestyle, Consumer Goods

Our process begins with users tokenizing their Web2 and Web3 data into confidential personal data assets. These assets are then managed by a smart DID, known as AI Buddy. Description: PATH EX has developed a proprietary technology to selectively separate and capture bacteria and toxins from human blood.
Full Description: PATH EX has developed a proprietary technology to selectively separate and capture bacteria and toxins from human blood, for the treatment of sepsis.  Sepsis, a life-threatening condition that commonly presents itself as a blood-borne infection, is the number one cause of death in the ICU and is the largest cost on their healthcare system.  PATH EX is taking a novel approach by capturing and removing intact bacteria from the blood rather than trying to kill the infection with broad spectrum antibiotics.  The PATH EX device is effective regardless of bacteria type or drug resistance. The PATH EX technology has the potential to reduce diagnostic times, treatment costs, readmission rates, and sepsis related deaths.
Industry Groups: Health Care
Top 5 Investors: MassChallenge, National Science Foundation, Texas HALO Fund, Innova Memphis, ZeroTo510

Description: Ampool enable real-time data-intensive applications through a distributed, memory-centric active data store.
Full Description: Ampool is on a mission to enable real-time data-intensive applications and to reduce time to actionable insights through a distributed, memory-centric active data store. In the last decade, Hadoop and NoSQL data stores have deconstructed the database, separating persistence, metadata management, query engines, resource scheduling, cluster management, and monitoring. In a similar way, Ampool aims to democratize in-memory multi-modal analytical processing, paving way to a unified real-time analytics platform. Ampool Active Data Store is designed to support stream ingestion and analytics, analytical/batch processing, transactions, and interactive/ad-hoc queries, all from a single memory-centric store. Powered by Apache Geode™, it offers low overhead, lightning fast, in-memory performance for data-driven applications without compromising on reliability and availability.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Software

Description: Glov is a software company developing AI supervised mini-robots to increase shopper satisfaction and sales conversion rates.
Full Description: E-commerce growth rates and margins are under pressure, so brands need new ways for "efficient growth" with fewer employees and smaller budgets. In order to grow, they must win conversions on their existing customer traffic. Unfortunately, most e-tailers are uncompetitive in "converting customers" because they have limited IT resources, insufficient know-how and small datasets. As a result, Brands with $50M-$1B in sales are missing out on $300 Billion in lost sales opportunities. Glov innovated AI-supervised mini-robots that predict a buyer's intent with just a few clicks and customize the product details, user interface, and copy in real-time, making it a first-of-its-kind product in the market. The mini-robots also learn from a large data pool by experimenting with multiple clients at the same time, which solves the cold-start problem and quickly delivers results. Glov is a team of Stanford graduates, Case Western PhDs, and AI Unicorn alums on their way to enabling millions of people with shopping innovations across all eCommerce touchpoints.

Description: A Web 3 game development studio producing the first race-and-earn GameFi for the Esports market.
Full Description: INTRODUCTION Today's Web 3 games are not good enough for mainstream gamers. It's evident in the market gap where there are only 3 million play-to-earn players and over 234 million esports gamers. As a Web 3 launchpad company that has assisted over 130+ NFT projects launch and a loyal gamer of titles such as FIFA and Forza since the 90s, we decided to do something to bridge this gap! THE NEXT STEP INTO WEB 3 We will use a proven sports growth formula coupled with Web 3 technological advantages of the blockchain to deliver an immersive game experience unlike any other. We've simplified the tokenomics and allow users to bring their own tokens and NFTs to form their own game, completely challenging the current norm of play-to-earns to solve the new player adoption and retention issues faced by all the competitors in the space. RACE-AND-EARN WITH RACER CLUB Introducing Racer Club, the first Web 3 racing game that brings the nostalgia of 'Mario Kart', story captions of 'Forza' and easy to build tracks of 'Hot Wheels'. Built in Unreal Engine and with a step-by-step roadmap set to revolutionise the Web 3 gaming space, the final goal is to cater for Club Managers, Players and Fans to become one with Esports connecting both worlds to be able to compete in the same level playing 'metaverse' of the future. WHY YOU SHOULD ENTRUST US The core team is led by CEO and co-founder, Matthew Ng, a startup entrepreneur with over 20 years experience in building, scaling and exiting businesses, and have previously done this successfully in the ecommerce, motorsports and energy sectors. Roman Granovskyi, the company's CTO and co-founder has over 15 years in the technology development space and has worked on various projects for brands such as Energizer, AWS and Atlassian. Vince Naselli, the company's CFO and co-founder has over 25 years and 7.7 billion in trade sales experience in M&As and business strategy. Together, the team's recent success include selling out 3 NFT projects under the brand ToastPunk and Irish Oracle amassing a community of over 75,000 loyal members and 130+ collaborative and strategic partners. EARLY STAGE INVESTOR Although there will be later on opportunities to become an investor for this project, we invite you to join Racer Club early in our current funding round. This will suit VCs and angels that are critical on using their investments to make the Web 3 space a better one as this is our main mission of this project alongside being the go to platform for Web 3 Esports and GameFi.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Gaming, Other, Sports
Founders: Matthew Ng, Roman Granovskyi, Vince Naselli

Description: Ullmanna revolutionizes agriculture with its AI-driven approach, providing efficient, sustainable, and eco-friendly weed control solutions.
Full Description: Ullmanna is an agricultural tech enterprise anchoring the next wave of sustainable farming. With a blend of electronics engineering and cutting-edge AI, we've crafted solutions that tackle the pressing challenge of weed control, replacing traditional methods with efficient, environmentally friendly alternatives. What We Do: Our flagship product, the AROW box, stands testament to our innovative approach. Utilizing advanced machine learning algorithms, it distinguishes crops from weeds, enabling precise mechanical weeding. This not only eliminates the need for harmful chemical herbicides but also reduces labor-intensive manual weeding. Designed for versatility, it's compatible with a diverse range of farming machinery, and its adaptability extends to various crops - from sugar beets and pumpkins to corn and potatoes. Vision: Our vision resonates beyond mere technology enhancement; it's about a sustainable agricultural future. In an era marked by climate change and environmental concerns, Ullmanna aspires to be at the forefront of eco-friendly farming solutions, diminishing the ecological footprint of agriculture while maximizing yield and profitability. Goals: Scaling: To make our technology accessible and affordable to a broader spectrum of farmers. Innovation: Continuous R&D to expand our product range and cater to diverse agricultural needs. Partnerships: Collaborate with agritech manufacturers, enhancing their portfolio and our market reach.
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Artificial Intelligence, Consumer Electronics, Data and Analytics, Hardware, Internet Services, Science and Engineering, Software, Sustainability

Description: SteamChain enables original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) to offer usage-based financing (hardware-as-a-service) to their customers.
Full Description: SteamChain enables original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) to offer usage-based financing (hardware-as-a-service) to their customers. Under the status quo, customers pay OEMs based on milestones before, during and after delivery of machines. Leveraging blockchain, SteamChain enables OEMs to be paid on the productivity of the machine over its lifecycle, increasing the OEMs long-term financial upside and better aligning incentives with their customers.

Description: Zarttech connects businesses with senior IT experts within 24 hours if needed or gets IT project done quickly and efficiently.
Full Description: Our mission at Zarttech is to bridge the talent gap by connecting diverse IT Experts with global work opportunities. How we make this happen: We bridge the talent gap by innovating technologies and processes that combat recruitment biases. We remove obstacles that prevent connecting diverse talents to global work opportunities, mitigate risks, carry on liability, and build trust resulting in a handshake between all stakeholders. This is what you gain from it: We at Zarttech can help you scale your business with senior IT Experts from diverse global backgrounds (Africa, Europe, and South America). Zarttech can also help get your IT project done quickly and efficiently while making a social impact individually and collectively. We provide you with the best hand-picked Senior IT Experts within 24 hours if needed. Our focus is on two main services: Outstaffing and Outsourcing. Outstaffing: We provide IT Experts to join your team on a fully remote, hybrid-remote, or onsite basis. They will work under your supervision. Zarttech employs all IT Experts, and after a duration of time of staffing through Zarttech, businesses can directly hire such talent or team when trust is built. As a result, our team will become part of your team. Outsourcing: You provide us with your project. Our expert(s) realise the solution using the highest quality agile practices. We also offer outsourcing services for custom software development projects where the Senior Experts are working, employed, and led by Zarttech. Our Foundation At Zarttech, we always pay it forward. Beyond the butterfly effect that positively impacts the global economy when you hire from us, our foundation is dedicated to educating more women tech talents in Africa. Every year 2% of our revenue is donated to our foundation; this revenue is focused on training 2000 women in tech in the next five years in Africa, contributing to ESG. Learn more about our mission by visiting: http://www.zarttech.com
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Professional Services, Software

Description: NanoHealth is changing the face of urban health in India.
Full Description: NanoHealth is solving one of the largest health problems of the 21 st century– Non-Communicable Diseases​ (NCDs) that account for highest deaths and disability across the world. NCDs cause 2 out of 3 deaths worldwide. The 2015 Non-Communicable Diseases (NCD) Global Survey showed that 1 in 4 Indians face the risk of death from an NCD before they hit the age of 70. In addition to causing premature deaths, NCDs also impede the quality of life of people. NCDs are a threat not only to human health, but also to economic development and growth. NCDs account for an annual loss of 5-10% of GDP in India, leading to a crippling effect on the individual and the economy. Current health care systems, both in the public and private sectors, are heavily oriented towards reactive care and episodic treatment. There is less emphasis on preventive, primary and continuous care that is required to manage long term clinical and behavioral modifications necessary to manage chronic conditions and reduce long term health costs for individuals and health systems. NanoHealth has taken on this challenge of building a solution to tackle NCDs at scale.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Other, Science and Engineering

Full Description: A few years ago, Roberto, founder of Justamente, had a problem with a service provider. The process of pursuing his rights was extremely painful and expensive, which led him to conceive a platform that operates in all sectors of consumer relations, seeking to help consumers to enforce their rights quickly and less costly (the client only pays if he is compensated). From this close relationship with lawyers, Roberto and the team began to understand the main pain points of this stakeholder. A professional without a digital presence, who did not have the necessary tools to attract clients and manage his practice. It was from this experience that Justamente emerged, with the aim of bringing this Brazilian Lawyers into the 21st century. In 5 minutes, the lawyer sets up his website and begins to grow his active client base, increasing his visibility in compliance with the Brazilian Bar (OAB).

Description: Telehealth Service Application
Full Description: Unity Partners Group owns the proprietary software for USADOCONCALL, Doc24seven, TRAVELDOK, ASIADOK and HOTELDOK trademarks and business platforms. Unity Partners. currently provides real-time consultation by multi-lingual, USA-certified physicians via our USADOCONCALL AND TRAVELDOK apps to smartphones anywhere and anytime.  USADOCONCALL (www.usadoconcall.com) is the first global Telehealth program designed for the global e-community. In association with telecom companies, affinity groups, membership businesses, HMOs, and mobile marketing companies. USADOCONCALL is a Telehealth service providing real-time consultations by USA-certified physicians. All physicians are based in the United States and are licensed under NCQA standards with an average of 10 years’ experience. Subscribers are able to upload all of their medical records and reports to a secured account and receive real-time opinions and consultations. TRAVELDOK (www.traveldok.com) is also the first global travel Telehealth service with no borders. During your travel anywhere in the world and if you’re feeling sick a doctor is just a click away! TRAVELDOK unique program with an active USA database of physicians via our app servicing by direct calls to your cell phone no matter what our service can be available. With the Covid 19 pandemic the importance of Telehealth has taken center stage in the world and no other Telehealth or Telehealth available that compares to our service. Via our Apps Doctors are available for you in minutes without the danger of exposing you or your loved ones and even the physicians of a dangerous virus. HOTELDOK is our unique concierge service providing hotel guests real time consults from USA Certified-Doctors preventing any sort of direct contact with physician. This service would be included with any hotel booking at a minimum cost to the hotel group. (Second Quarter 2022)  Doc24seven will feature Telehealth services into the Global community. Doc24seven will be utilizing our Global Telehealth platform (GTP) managing full-service Telehealth business in selected countries. Physicians will be recruited for consultations in our partner countries. Doc24seven will provide a free service for every subscriber using our apps and each subscriber will be able to find a doctor or the closest clinic or hospital. The service will identify the doctor for a live consultation and know the location and contact information to make an appointment with the doctor or visit a clinic or hospital as needed. POCKETCARE is our unique program driven to the Caribbean Islands Government and Tele-coo’s database. It focuses on providing local medical support to all residents and their families, a service that is not readily available in the current health scenario pre and post pandemic. Additional Services - Mental Health  Behavioral health includes the emotions and behaviors that affect your overall well-being. Behavioral health is sometimes called mental health and often includes substance use. Just like physical health, behavioral health has trained providers who can help you much like a physical health care provider would. Everyone has the strength to make important behavioral health changes, but many people are too nervous to talk about it during a health care visit. Asking for support comes with many benefits though. As communities gather around those in need, behavioral health providers are there to support you or your loved one throughout the journey. Virtual Counseling - Feeling overwhelmed, experiencing anxiety or depression? Now you can choose the mental health solution that’s just right for you! Consult with a Master Degreed Counselor. The amount of counseling sessions will be clinically appropriate based on the issue. This program is for short-term problem resolution, referral, and crisis intervention services. No Visit Fee Virtual Psychologist Service - Virtual Psychologist Service gives rapid access, lower costs, all from the comfort of your own home. Our licensed Psychologists (PhD, PsyD, or EdD) assess your symptoms, evaluate your medical and family history, and help determine a course of action moving forward. Medical Advise - Unity’s, USADOCONCALL Telehealth program is the first ever Telehealth service providing real- time second opinions from USA Certified Physicians. Description: We streamline communication and the flow of information to help provider reduce cost and improve care for at-risk populations.
Full Description: You can only solve the problems you know about.  Today, the healthcare system only knows about the health and needs of digitally isolated populations during annual checkups or when they show up in the ER.  No amount of healthcare system led telehealth, remote patient monitoring or facility based efficiency improvements can change this fact.  Porchlight Health solves the underlying communication problem and creates a new path forward for health and cost control. By "opening the home" with a services enabled and secure modern digital platform we are forever changing the way healthcare system support at-risk populations. Porchlight Health is a services enabled platform that solves the underlying communication problem preventing $65 billion of Medicare spending from being virtualized.  We create a digital front door into the homes and daily lives of at-risk populations, then provide family, healthcare and community service providers smart digital access.   DIGITAL FRONT DOOR:  Porchlight solves the digital isolation problem for seniors in their homes.  By doing this we create smart, HIPAA compliant digital access for family, friends, community resources and all healthcare providers. COLLECT THE NON-CLINICAL DATA THAT DETERMINE HEALTH OUTCOMES:  We collect over 300 social determinant of health, wellbeing and connection data points for each use every month.  Those data points power machine learning and automation that create new cost saving efficiency and quality of care. STREAMLINE COMMUNICATION:  Communication between seniors and their ecosystem of clinical and non-clinical support is consolidated onto one platform.  AI & AUTOMATION:  Porchlight Health is a data rich platform.  Each user and provider that joins the Porchlight platform contributes data that improves the efficiency of the machine learning and automation. Today, every healthcare provider has an EHR that streamlines clinical documentation and billing.  10 years from now every provider will also have an integrated communication platform like Porchlight that streamlines communication and the flow of data.
Industry Groups: Health Care, Mobile
Top 5 Investors: Nex Cubed, Nex Cubed Digital Health

Description: Snap2Insight is an Internet based company.
Full Description: One of the leading health and personal care brands had planned a promotional campaign offering bonus packs at a promotional price in the face of some intense competition from its rival brand. Their customer (Team Leader for the brand at a retail chain) had worked with a major retailer to put up pallet displays with eye catching graphic skirts across all its stores nationwide. Their customer has often seen poor sales lift across 30-40% stores for such campaigns in the past. Snap2Insight was tasked to verify quality of execution nationwide and identify stores with incomplete execution or no execution. Leveraging their partnership with a leading crowdsourcing vendor, they quickly gathered photos of displays from every single store and using their patent pending Deep Learning technology, they analysed them to recognise SKUs stocked, present of graphic skirt, promotional price and type of display put up. Using execution scores they provided for each store covered under this promotional campaign, their customer worked with their retail coverage partner (merchandiser) to prioritise and fix all stores with low execution score and high potential for sales lift, thereby improving sales and achieving break over for over 90% of stores.
Industry Groups: Internet Services

Description: MOVA is a PropTech company that harnesses the power of AI, NLP, and blockchain to streamline property search and verification processes.
Full Description: Our company delivers user-first platform to streamline hassle-free property searching experience through AI-driven technologies.  What we can help- We make your move easier with locals' voices and best-fitted information. Opinions matter- Everyone can make their voices sound with MOVA about your neighbourhood, the development you are living in and more. With our machine-learning-driven search engine, Your property searches are then filled with pragmatic experience instead of wild guesses. Get informed first- ‘Where should I start with’ is the most common question when a person starts his/her property searches, after deciding to relocate to a new place. MOVA turns data from different databases into user-friendly metrics, which allows you to understand the surroundings during your search. Safety? Convenience? Good food around? It’s just ONE CLICK! MOVA was founded based on painful experiences. We aim to bring joy and fun but not agony.  The Door of Property Search- MOVA started with an idea — Moving to a new city is always a pain and property search constitutes the main part of it. Founders of MOVA then decided to establish an entrance where movers could receive best-fitted, reliable property information, being well-informed as locals.  Digitalisation Embraced- Founding members in MOVA had gone through significant difficulties and hurdles in the existing scattered and chaotic customer journey. We believe the cutting-edge blockchain technology will bring all parties premier efficiency and experience in property market, from sellers to buyers, from agencies to mortgage broker.

Full Description: Amicus is a web and mobile based application which scans and summarizes eCommerce sites for hidden Terms and Conditions. Amicus is a data company that aggregates reviews, ratings & complaints using machine learning and NLP, summarizes the agreement highlighting the riskiest terms and suggests alternate buying options with reduced risks.  Amicus uses its patent-pending algorithm, the AmicRank Algorithm, to show the real cost of a product by considering various factors like number of past complaints, ratings of the seller, cost of resolving a complaint.

Description: Akoya transforms the way people share their data by making it more secure, private, reliable, and transparent.
Full Description: Akoya transforms the way people share their data by making it more secure, private, reliable, and transparent. Akoya replaces screen scraping with application programming interfaces (APIs), enabling individuals to share their data with fintech apps using their financial institution’s existing online portal. This eliminates the need for login information to be held and stored by anyone else. Additionally, Akoya provides a simple way for people to grant, modify, or revoke access to their financial data at any time. Through a single integration with Akoya, financial institutions, fintechs, and data aggregators can enable multiple API connections and avoid continued maintenance and development efforts. Akoya handles all data-sharing relationships on behalf of network participants and removes the myriad of internal and external costs required to develop and manage multiple third-party agreements.   Akoya optimizes for security, transparency, and scalability, and offers a passthrough model that does not copy, store, or hold any financial data or personal information. The network is an interoperable solution available to the entire financial services industry. Akoya was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts, USA.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Privacy and Security

Description: Cloudstitch is a web development platform that uses your office suite as the back-end.
Full Description: Cloudstitch is an early-stage, venture-backed, Y Combinator start-up serving the developer community based on research started at MIT. Their web developer platform connects webs/mobile apps with ordinary spreadsheets, replacing custom databases and the infrastructure surrounding it. The data flows both ways: updating your spreadsheet automatically changes the website, and interacting with the website changes your spreadsheet. They’re used in production by thousands of web developers on both the Google and Microsoft Office platforms. Their mission is to democratize the web, making web development simpler. faster, and more intuitive.

Description: Fintech digital health platform: a smarter way for patients, payors, providers to find a great price, schedule care, and simplify payment.
Full Description: Savvos created the nation's largest marketplace of affordable cash prices for elective outpatient care, including imaging, surgery, labs, and more.  Our solution redefines the healthcare experience of patients, payors, and providers by connecting all participants in the healthcare decision to create bundled pricing in real time, simplify scheduling, secure payor approval, and guarantee immediate cash payment™. Savvos eliminates the need for health plans to develop networks or direct contracts for elective outpatient care by making immediate cash payment the future of mainstream healthcare.  Savvos members know the cost when scheduling care, and providers are paid immediately; this unique combination reduces medical costs up to 90% compared to traditional networks or legacy billing practices.  The implementation of immediate cash payment solutions within health plans has resulted in a drastic cost reduction compared to billed charges, contracted rates, direct contracts, and allowable amounts for elective outpatient care.   The examples below are pulled from actual procedure requests within the Savvos system: Example 1:  Inguinal Hernia Repair	CPT Code 49505	Zip Code 46123 Proposed Cost Without Savvos: Billed Charge for Facility Only: $19,739 Allowed Charge for Facility: $13,560 Allowed Charge for Surgeon: $2,200 (estimated cost) Allowed Charge for Anesthesia:  $800 (estimated cost) Total Allowed Charge without Savvos: $16,560 Savvos Solution: Immediate Cash Pay Bundled Price: $8,330 Result: 49.7% reduction in costs through Savvos Example 2:  Tympanostomy 		CPT Code 69436	Zip Code 23502	 Proposed Cost Without Savvos: Allowed Charge for Bundled Price: $11,810 Savvos Solution: Immediate Cash Pay Bundled Price: $2,200 Result: 81.4% reduction in costs through Savvos Example 3:  Cervical Disc Rep	CPT Code 22856	Zip Code 80233 Proposed Cost Without Savvos: Billed Charge for Facility & Anesthesia: $85,000 Allowed Charge for Facility & Anesthesia: $34,450 Allowed Charge for Surgeon: $4,068 Total Allowed Charge without Savvos: $38,518 Savvos Solution: Immediate Cash Pay Bundled Price: $12,500 Result: 67.55% reduction in costs through Savvos Example 4:  Total Lap Hysterectomy	CPT Code 58570	Zip Code 92861 Proposed Cost Without Savvos: Allowed Charge for Facility: $27,325 Allowed Charge for Surgeon: $4,200 Allowed Charge for Anesthesia:  $1,108 Total Allowed Charge without Savvos: $32,633 Savvos Solution: Immediate Cash Pay Bundled Price: $7,895 Result: 76% reduction in costs through Savvos The movement towards price transparency requires more than a casual listing of chargemaster prices or regional averages.  Savvos connects patients with actual prices from facilities located in the patient’s local market, resulting in dramatic cost savings to the health plan.  Most patients are provided with generous financial incentives to engage with affordable providers through Savvos, including waiving the deductible or waiving all out-of-pocket costs.  The results of implementing Savvos are powerful: 1.	Enhanced member experience through Savvos messaging center that connects all parties involved in the decision-making process for a specific procedure 2.	Dramatic cost reductions for health plans 3.	Improved member benefits through generous incentives such as deductible waivers 4.	Immediate cash payment to participating providers
Industry Groups: Health Care
Top 5 Investors: Wefunder, Assure Syndicates, Lance Evenson, Stuart Schantz, Daniel Harris

Description: Akknatek provides solutions for ophthalmology, with the aim of improving cataract surgery.
Full Description: Akknatek is a patented technology that is included in the lens reviewer with the intention of enhancing patients' visual outcomes, particularly with IOLs, and encouraging IOL implantations in clinics. The lens reviewer decides how to treat an intraocular lens that has dislocated after surgery. It lessens the possibility of unexpected post-operative refractive complications following cataract surgery and can further reduce the necessity for subsequent refractive procedures.
